# Running a python code

```{python}
# Import the matplotlib library
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Create data
x = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
y = [10, 15, 7, 20, 10]

# Create a simple line plot
plt.plot(x, y)
plt.xlabel('X-axis')
plt.ylabel('Y-axis')
plt.title('Simple Line Plot')

# Display the plot
plt.show()
```

Use 'exit' to exit the python console, and return to the R console
